name: Life of ITman
description:
DESCRIPTION

Life of ITman is a game built in 72 hours for the 46th Ludum Dare game jam in April of 2020.

"Because he's the hero this company doesn't deserve, but the one it needs right now. So we have him fix our computers, take care of servers and stop hackers. Because he can do it. Because he is not our hero. He's a silent guardian, a watchful protector."

"He is ITman"

Become the techie, the unsung hero of every modern company, making sure the servers are okay, all hackers are stopped and every employee has their problems resolved.

No wonder they drink more caffeine than the rest of the office combined.

FEATURES

  • Help co-workers with "useful" advice
  • Resolve "issues" with the server
  • Stop hackers from blowing up computers
  • Drink unhealthy amounts of caffeine
  • Probably still get fired
  • Online leader board lets you compare your performance to fellow ITmen (only in desktop build)

CONTROLS

Movement Interact/Pick up item

Energy drink

Pause

Run
